field.name: id
field.title: Pledge ID
field.comment: Pledge ID

field.name: contact_id
field.title: Contact ID
field.comment: Foreign key to civicrm_contact.id .

field.name: contribution_type_id
field.comment: FK to Contribution Type. This is propagated to contribution record when pledge payments are made.

field.name: financial_type_id
field.title: Type
field.comment: FK to Financial Type

field.name: contribution_page_id
field.title: Pledge Contribution Page
field.comment: The Contribution Page which triggered this contribution

field.name: amount
field.title: Total Pledged
field.comment: Total pledged amount.

field.name: original_installment_amount
field.title: Original Installment Amount
field.comment: Original amount for each of the installments.

field.name: currency
field.title: Pledge Currency
field.comment: 3 character string, value from config setting or input via user.

field.name: frequency_unit
field.title: Pledge Frequency Unit
field.comment: Time units for recurrence of pledge payments.

field.name: frequency_interval
field.title: Pledge Frequency Interval
field.comment: Number of time units for recurrence of pledge payments.

field.name: frequency_day
field.title: Pledge day
field.comment: Day in the period when the pledge payment is due e.g. 1st of month, 15th etc. Use this to set the scheduled dates for pledge payments.

field.name: installments
field.title: Pledge Number of Installments
field.comment: Total number of payments to be made.

field.name: start_date
field.title: Pledge Start Date
field.comment: The date the first scheduled pledge occurs.

field.name: create_date
field.title: Pledge Made
field.comment: When this pledge record was created.

field.name: acknowledge_date
field.title: Pledge Acknowledged
field.comment: When a pledge acknowledgement message was sent to the contributor.

field.name: modified_date
field.title: Pledge Modified Date
field.comment: Last updated date for this pledge record.

field.name: cancel_date
field.title: Pledge Cancelled Date
field.comment: Date this pledge was cancelled by contributor.

field.name: end_date
field.title: Pledge End Date
field.comment: Date this pledge finished successfully (total pledge payments equal to or greater than pledged amount).

field.name: honor_contact_id
field.title: Pledge Honor Contact
field.comment: FK to contact ID. Used when pledge is made in honor of another contact. This is propagated to contribution records when pledge payments are made.

field.name: honor_type_id
field.title: Honor Type
field.comment: Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: max_reminders
field.title: Maximum Number of Reminders
field.comment: The maximum number of payment reminders to send for any given payment.

field.name: initial_reminder_day
field.title: Initial Reminder Day
field.comment: Send initial reminder this many days prior to the payment due date.

field.name: additional_reminder_day
field.title: Additional Reminder Days
field.comment: Send additional reminder this many days after last one sent, up to maximum number of reminders.

field.name: status_id
field.title: Pledge Status Id
field.comment: Implicit foreign key to civicrm_option_values in the contribution_status option group.

field.name: campaign_id
field.title: Campaign ID
field.comment: The campaign for which this pledge has been initiated.
